values.global: Read and write access to all of your account, apps and resources.
values.identity: Read-only access to your account information.
values.read: Read-only access to all of your apps and resources, excluding account information and configuration variables.
values.read-protected: Read-only access to all of your apps and resources, excluding account information. Includes configuration variables, which may include runtime secrets.
values.write: Read and write access to all of your apps and resources, excluding account information and configuration variables.
values.write-protected: Read and write access to all of your apps and resources, excluding account information. Includes configuration variables, which may include runtime secrets.
